attributes.action: Publicly Investigate the over inflated costs of the CAA's registration solution.
attributes.additional_details:
Renewal of shot gun license £9.00/year kills hundreds
Renewal of car driving license £1.40/year kills thousands, allowing the holder to drive on the UK road ways.
Renewal of Fishing license £30-£80/year allowing the holder to fish the UK's water ways.
Renewal of shot gun license £9.00/year kills hundreds
Renewal of model flying license £16.50/year no one reportedly ever killed, with zero benefit to license holder.
attributes.background: CAA estimate that the running costs for 1 October 2019 to 31 March 2020 will be £1.3m with an ongoing annual est. cost of £2.8m including irrecoverable VAT at 19%. This is hugely over inflated in comparison to similar industry leading database systems and support which needs public investigation.
